* Contact: Robbie Groenewoudt dutchmega@gmail.com Alex Mayorga Adame alex.mayorga@gmail.com
* Brand: Dell
* Make : Inspiron
* Model: 1501
* Website: http://www.dell.com/content/products/productdetails.aspx/inspn_1501?c=us&cs=19&l=en&s=dhs

=== Current Issues ===
* Black screen when resuming after a suspend
* Hard disk is not recognized. Fix: Add "pci=nomsi" to boot.
* Wireless NIC is not recognized. Fix: ndiswrapper
* Touchpad is not turned off while typing. <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=271052|Fix available on forum]]</nowiki>
* Changing brightness with keyboard shortcuts doesn't work. Sometimes crashes Xorg
